avdta.gui.util

Class ProjectFileView

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.filechooser.FileView
      • avdta.gui.util.ProjectFileView

  • public class ProjectFileView
extends javax.swing.filechooser.FileView
    This class provides a modified FileView that displays Project folders with a special icon. Project folders are identified via the project.txt file. In addition, this class can select projects of specific types. It looks for a type.dat indicator file (e.g. dta.dat) to determine the type of Project.

        public int isProject(java.io.File file)
        Returns a code indicating whether the specified file is a Project, and if it matches the specific type of Project.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to be checked
        Returns:
